title: House for rent
description: Live this beautiful, newly renovated South Philadelphia row home. This home includes a primary suite with adjoining bathroom and skyline views, private rear patio, 9ft ceiling finished basement, exposed brick, brand new appliances, new countertops, cabinets and wood flooring, central heating/cooling, an in-unit washer dryer, and a security system. The main floor has a half bath, coat closet, dining area, kitchen, living room and back door which connects to the rear patio. Upstairs are three bedrooms including the primary suite, secondary bedroom, and a smaller third bedroom suitable for a nursery or office. Additionally there is a second full bathroom in the upstairs hallway. The finished basement can be used as a guest bedroom, office, game room, gym or another living space given the RARE 9ft ceilings. Unrestricted off-street parking. 5 min walk to broad street, 10 min to East Passyunk Square.

title: Beautiful 3 BR / 2.5 BA
description:
Welcome to this lovingly restored Brewerytown home! The front entrance is flooded with natural light through the vestibule and into the open concept living space, where the original hardwood floors have been restored and polished, and straight through the living room into the kitchen. Oversized windows create a natural bright, airy environment, which the contemporary kitchen plays off with glossy granite countertops, a beautiful beveled white tile backsplash, custom carved white cabinetry and stainless steal appliances. A powder room is located conveniently off the kitchen. There is a mudroom with full laundry in the back of the house which leads outside to a patio complete with a wooden overhead garden trellis. Downstairs, the basement contains hundreds of feet of functional semi-finished space for storage or other use. The dramatic high ceilings and original hardwood floors carry from the first floor to the second where two full bathrooms and three bedrooms are found. The location provides immediate access to SEPTA bus stops, Indigo (bike share) stations, and the bustling retail environment surrounding Girard Avenue. Aldi is located right down the street and Fairmount and The Art Museum areas are a short walk away. This home is available for rent immediately!
Owner pays water utility, tenant is responsible for gas and electric utilities. First month, last month, and security deposit due at signing. No smoking permitted. Small dogs considered.

title: Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment Home with Wood Floors, Gym, Near Stores
description:
The home at 1015 is a 575 square foot one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 10th floor in a high-rise building located on Rittenhouse Square! This renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. The bathroom is also renovated. This home features wood floors. Most of the large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One of the windows in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a view of the park. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table from Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 24/7 top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 On-site Maintenance
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Large closets
* Large windows
* Carpet
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
* Special *
Apply for this home at 1015 today, elect a 13-22 month lease term, and then move in on or before June 1, 2022 to take $500.00 off your pro-rated rent!
Certain restrictions apply. Limited time offer.
Wondering if this home is still available for lease? Visit our website at https://rittenhouseclaridge.com/floor-plans/ to see if 1015 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan. Please make an appointment to tour on our website. You may tour in person. Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103

title: New fitness center, Seasonal Bike Share Program, Beautiful courtyards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient.
